alert.note: Alert for Bienville; Bossier; Caddo; De Soto; Natchitoches; Red River; Sabine; Webster (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 03 at 12:17AM CST until March 03 at 1:15AM CST by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Webster Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Eastern De Soto Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Red River Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Western Natchitoches Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Southeastern Caddo Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Southwestern Bienville Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Southeastern Bossier Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Sabine Parish in northwestern Louisiana... North central Sabine County in eastern Texas... * Until 115 AM CST. * At 1216 AM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles south of Bossier City to near Milam, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Natchitoches, Mansfield, Milam, Many, Coushatta, Zwolle, Ringgold, Campti, Converse, Allen, Oak Grove, Pleasant Hill, Provencal, Natchez, Martin, Clarence, Hall Summit, Saline, Lucky and Ashland. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 AM CST for northwestern Louisiana. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Bienville; Bossier; Caddo; De Soto; Natchitoches; Red River; Sabine; Webster
